Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: C
Reviews.Content: For all your basic, messaging, calling and internet functions, this little phone works exceedingly well and for an excellent price as well.Had it for quite some time and expect to have it for a long time to come. Don't need any fancy i-phone.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: imlatetoday
Reviews.Content: the phone was just as described. it is an excellent purchase for the price and i do believe i recieved it a day before it was scheduled to arrive. my daughter is very happy with it and she is an extreme texter!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: tracies
Reviews.Content: Really don't like this phone.  Keys are so small they go under my nails when I text.  The phone is much smaller than it looks. And the keys some times quit working when i am texting. DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE.  awful

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Debra Schnell
Reviews.Content: The phone works very well.  It does not have very good ring tones, and does not take good pictures.  It is hard to figure out how to use the question mark key as well as the exclamation key, but other than that, it is a really good phone.

Reviews.Title: LOOKS LIKE NEW OLDER MODLE NO DISAPOINTMENT
Reviews.Author: Leo R.
Reviews.Content: IT was everything i expected being an older modle,just what i was looking for a good bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Subryna Olesia Smith
Reviews.Content: the phone is as described, excellent condition and packaging. i really love it. i am really excited and impressed  overall very good

Reviews.Title: Bad Buy
Reviews.Author: karen
Reviews.Content: Worst buy ever. I purchased this phone less than two months and already the phone is malfunctioning. It refuses to make calls.  This phone ought to be recalled and customers refunded.  UNHAPPY CUSTOMER

Reviews.Title: Samsung A257
Reviews.Author: Gillian De Freitas
Reviews.Content: Got the phoen it works well, the keys are a bit hard to press but other than that its good...

Reviews.Title: VERY  HAPPY
Reviews.Author: T Mac
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the condition of the phone....even though it was new.It was exactly what I wanted! A keyboard and screen without the smartphone add ons and pricing.Also happy with the delivery time....received when promisedCould not have asked for more!!!

Reviews.Title: Worked for 3 weeks
Reviews.Author: sandy
Reviews.Content: This phone worked for 3 weeks and then it just started to have lots of static, i called att to troubleshoot the phone and they knew it was the bad phone!  Money lost and they had a no return policy i should have been lead by my first mind not to buy because there is no warranty!

Reviews.Title: Hate This Phone
Reviews.Author: Paige Hawkins
Reviews.Content: The keys are so tiny and close together that I am forever making mistakes.  And the number of keys I have to press in order to add an address and send texts is ridiculous.The ringtones are awful as are the default wallpapers.Would NEVER recommend this phone and will not buy a phone without being able to try it first.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG A257
Reviews.Author: Cherry Jennings
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera! The sound and pictures are clear. The camera is very good and easy to use. Overall, I'd recommend this camera to anyone, but especially beginners.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Affordable messaging phone with full QWERTY keyboard for easy typing on the go
Compatible with AT&T;'s EDGE data network; access to mobile email, text/picture messaging and instant messaging
Bluetooth for handsfree devices; VGA camera for still photos; 64 MB memory (non-expandable); personal organizer
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 250 hours (10+ days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung A257 Unlocked QuadBand Phone with QWERTY Keyboard and Camera - Unlocked Phone - No Warranty - Orange
